CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Type of connector - must be EXTERNAL_IMPORT for import connectors

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: Comma-separated list of OpenCTI entity types that this connector can import

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: ISO 8601 duration between connector runs (e.g., PT2H for 2 hours)

CONNECTOR_QUEUE_THRESHOLD.description: Maximum number of messages in the connector queue before throttling

CONNECTOR_TLP_LEVEL.description: Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) marking for imported data

OPENCTI_URL.description: The URL of the OpenCTI platform instance

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: Authentication token for accessing the OpenCTI API

GTI_API_KEY.description: API key for authenticating with the Google Threat Intelligence service

GTI_API_URL.description: Base URL for the Google Threat Intelligence API

GTI_CAMPAIGN_IMPORT_START_DATE.description: ISO 8601 duration string specifying how far back to import campaigns (e.g., P1D for 1 day, P7D for 7 days)

GTI_IMPORT_CAMPAIGNS.description: Whether to enable importing campaign data from GTI

GTI_CAMPAIGN_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of campaign origins to import, or 'All' for all origins. Allowed values: All, partner, crowdsourced, google threat intelligence

GTI_VULNERABILITY_IMPORT_START_DATE.description: ISO 8601 duration string specifying how far back to import vulnerabilities (e.g., P1D for 1 day, P7D for 7 days)

GTI_IMPORT_VULNERABILITIES.description: Whether to enable importing vulnerability data from GTI

GTI_VULNERABILITY_GET_RELATED_SOFTWARES.description: Whether to enable importing related software data from vulnerability data

GTI_VULNERABILITY_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of vulnerability origins to import, or 'All' for all origins. Allowed values: All, partner, crowdsourced, google threat intelligence

GTI_MALWARE_FAMILY_IMPORT_START_DATE.description: ISO 8601 duration string specifying how far back to import malware families (e.g., P1D for 1 day, P7D for 7 days)

GTI_IMPORT_MALWARE_FAMILIES.description: Whether to enable importing malware family data from GTI

GTI_MALWARE_FAMILY_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of malware family origins to import, or 'All' for all origins. Allowed values: All, partner, crowdsourced, google threat intelligence

GTI_ENABLE_MALWARE_ALIASES.description: Whether to enable importing malware family aliases from GTI

GTI_THREAT_ACTOR_IMPORT_START_DATE.description: ISO 8601 duration string specifying how far back to import threat actors (e.g., P1D for 1 day, P7D for 7 days)

GTI_IMPORT_THREAT_ACTORS.description: Whether to enable importing threat actor data from GTI

GTI_THREAT_ACTOR_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of threat actor origins to import, or 'All' for all origins. Allowed values: All, partner, crowdsourced, google threat intelligence

GTI_ENABLE_THREAT_ACTOR_ALIASES.description: Whether to enable importing threat actor aliases from GTI

GTI_REPORT_IMPORT_START_DATE.description: ISO 8601 duration string specifying how far back to import reports (e.g., P1D for 1 day, P7D for 7 days)

GTI_IMPORT_REPORTS.description: Whether to enable importing report data from GTI

GTI_REPORT_TYPES.description: Comma-separated list of report types to import, or 'All' for all types. Allowed values: All, Actor Profile, Country Profile, Cyber Physical Security Roundup, Event Coverage/Implication, Industry Reporting, Malware Profile, Net Assessment, Network Activity Reports, News Analysis, OSINT Article, Patch Report, Strategic Perspective, TTP Deep Dive, Threat Activity Alert, Threat Activity Report, Trends and Forecasting, Weekly Vulnerability Exploitation Report

GTI_REPORT_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of report origins to import, or 'All' for all origins. Allowed values: All, partner, crowdsourced, google threat intelligence
